title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Clinical Learning Innovation in the COVID-19 Era: Online Self-

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply patient assessment protocols with over 80% accuracy through virtual clinical scenarios.
Learners can explain at least three core elements of COVID-19 response medical protocols using e-learning modules.

In 5-person team-based online projects, learners design three infectious disease management strategies (e.g., isolation protocols, transmission route blocking, patient monitoring) using PBL (Problem-Based Learning), achieving a combined score of 80/100 or higher from peer evaluation (30%) and expert evaluation (70%).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
